description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Guitar Hero 5 has been cancelled and Rock Band has stopped DLC. Heroes of Rock gives gamers a chance to rock out again but in a whole new way - through an action game. Heroes of Rock is a side scrolling action game designed for the guitar peripheral and injected with Heavy Metal influence. Experience original heavy metal music composed by Leeland Campana and take on the satanic music industry.
description.short: Guitar Hero 5 has been cancelled and Rock Band has stopped DLC. Heroes of Rock gives gamers a chance to rock out again but in a whole new way - through an action game. Experience original heavy metal music composed by Leeland Campana and take on the satanic music industry.
